bigram model.from sentence: As can be seen , the bigram model performs better than the unigram model and the addition of the IDF - weighted word count features significantly improve performance for both models by 10 % - 15 % .

best models ( bigram + count ).from sentence: As can be seen in , our best models ( bigram + count ) outperform all baselines and prior work on MAP and are very close to the best model proposed by Yih et al. on MRR .
